TopicTitle: updated to 1.4.4.2215 how to use kerbalengineer

Articles.Content:
okay. i like the changes. but the only working mods are the fps viewer and anyresu. i can swallow up not using all the other mods except kerbalengineer (mod that allows you to view all info from orbital, surface, thermal etc). i have been spoon fed by this mod for years that playing without it is a nightmare. any idea how to use this mod or any other mod currently compatible that was good as that? thanks.

update: fixed. was a moron for not manually updating the mod.

Edited July 4, 2018 by michanst
